title: 自由未未之歌
content:
感谢制作这首歌曲的两位艺术家（PJ GONZALEZ和TRES），太给力了！

歌曲简介：
A SONG IN SUPPORT OF AI WEIWEI THE CHINESE ARTIST AND ACTIVIST AND IN DEFENSE OF HUMAN RIGHTS IN CHINA AND THE WORLD. AI’S VOICE AND MESSAGE WAS BROUGHT IN THE SONG. ENJOY! PLEASE SPREAD IT.
Produced by PJ GONZALEZ who also played drums and percussion. TRES played guitars, bass, keyboards and did the vocals and the selction of Ai’s voice excerpts.

这首歌用来支持艾未未（作为一个中国艺术家和作为一个活动家），以及用来捍卫中国和世界的人权。艾的声音和消息在这首歌曲中出现。希望你能喜欢并且传播！
制作人：PJ GONZALEZ（同时也是鼓和打击乐器手）
TRES演奏了吉他，贝斯，键盘以及声部和艾未未声音的选择。

http://youtu.be/UQDz-7EcNJU

下载：http://www.wuala.com/ruanji/Share/FreeWeiweiSong/

歌曲的Facebook页面：
https://www.facebook.com/pages/FREE-WEIWEI-the-song/226540694024015

歌词：

FREE WEIWEI
“Nobody can stop the course of change.
It’s impossible to stop freedom,
you know, it´s just like the wind.”

Free Weiwei!
Bring down the Great Firewall of China.
Free Weiwei!
Tear down the Great Firewall of China.

2011, year of the jasmine
a government crackdown sweeps up
bloggers and writers and human rights lawyers
but the son of the poet speaks on

“This nation has no humanity
they crush down everybody who has different opinions,
not even different opinions, just different attitude.
It can cost your life.
I don´t want to be part of this,
of the denying of the reality.
We live in this time,
we have to speak out.”

Free Weiwei!
Bring down the Great Firewall of China.
Free Weiwei!
Break down the Great Firewall of China.

On April the third, 2011
Weiwei the artist was detained
as part of a clampdown on dissident voices.
Now Weiwei is missing
so, speak out!

“My political involvement is really personal.
If you don´t speak out,
if you don´t clear your mind
then, who are you?
Life is never guaranteed to be safe,
so we better use it when we are still in the good condition.”

Free Weiwei!
Free Ai Weiwei!
Release Weiwei!
Free Ai Weiwei, hey! (2)

“China has a Great Firewall which forbids any information they think is sensitive.
The struggle is always very, very strong there
because the government basically censors anything they don´t like.”

Free China.
Bring down the Great Firewall of China.
Free China.
Tear down the Great Firewall of China.
Let creative spirit fly!
Free China.
Break down the Great Firewall of China.
Creative spirit fly!
Free Weiwei!
Free Ai Weiwei!
Release Weiwei!
Guo Quan
Huang Qi
Liu Xiaobo
Shi Tao
Tan Zuoren
Wen Tao
